hero.title:
Your [Data]
Beautifully Organized Finally
hero.subtitle:
Stop retyping the same information.
Amorfs captures what you enter once, stores it securely,
and lets you reuse it anywhere.
Or transform it into something beautiful to share.

problem.label: Data Problem
problem.title: You enter the same information
problem.description:
Forms, profiles, applications - endless repetition.
Your data is scattered across dozens of sites, locked away in incompatible formats, impossible to reuse.

solution.label: Amorfs Solution
solution.initialSubtitle:
We're solving data from the ground up.
No more endless retyping.
No more scattered information.

extension.title: Amorfs Extension
extension.heading: Never Retype the Same Thing Twice
extension.description: The extension watches as you fill out forms and automatically captures your data - names, addresses, preferences, any details you enter. Next time it's right there, ready to reuse with a click.
features: Executive assistants managing information for others
Who value their time and privacy

studio.title: Amorfs Studio
studio.heading: Curate. Design. Share.
studio.description: Transform your data into something beautiful. Amorfs Studio lets you personalize and curate your information, then bring it to life with stunning layout templates from our library or create your own.

privacy.title: Your Privacy
privacy.description2: architecture means we never see your unencrypted data. You're in complete control.

howItWorks.title: How Amorfs Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple on the Surface. Sophisticated Beneath.

capture.title: Capture
capture.description: Your data lives in an intuitive text format that's easy to read, edit, and share backed by a sophisticated semantic model that understands concepts, not just text.

store.title: Personalise
store.description: Bring your data to life with embedded styling, created and shared by our growing community of designers.

reuse.title: Share and Reuse
reuse.description: Post on socials and email. Receive, adopt and adapt. Create and swap styles. Make your data personal.

future.title: Amorfs is not just a tool
future.description:
It's the foundation for how intelligent systems should understand information.

By capturing small data with complete fidelity and representing it at the concept level, Amorfs enables AI to reason more accurately and efficiently. It's a glimpse into a future where data flows seamlessly, intelligently, and naturally.
future.descriptionNormal:
It's the foundation for how intelligent systems should understand information.

By capturing small data with complete fidelity and representing it at the concept level, Amorfs enables AI to reason more accurately and efficiently. It's a glimpse into a future where data flows seamlessly, intelligently, and naturally.
